metadata.name: Never regret, never feel Blue.
metadata.description:
OK, Actually someone used to make me feel blue with any reason that I don’t understand. This potion will bewitch anybody I really want they fall head over heals in love with me, I will no longer be heartbroken. 

I know I’m a weird one, with a tail, with a couple of fin as my ears. So what? It’s very difficult to find my loved one although I'm beautiful mermaid obviously.

These book give me a mystery, they told me to put something magically before casting an ancient spell. Well, it’s work. Wow, Epic 3 potions as its ingredients are wonderful. Put some human’s diamond and some rare sea plant.

Magic candle will be illuminate underwater, some undersea creatures appear to support me, oh thank you.

When the first dose of this potion completed, I would like to have the first experiment with somebody poor, it could be you exclusively, come on baby.
